mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T05_GEN_HISTORY_STREAM ( GEN_HIS_NO , TYPE , PATH , DEL_FLG , CREATE_USER , CREATE_DATE , CREATE_TIME , LAST_USER , LAST_DATE , LAST_TIME ) VALUES ( #{GenHisNo} , #{Type} , #{Path} , #{DelFlg} , #{CreateUser} , #{CreateDate} , #{CreateTime} , #{LastUser} , curdate() , curtime() )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update: UPDATE T05_GEN_HISTORY_STREAM SET GEN_HIS_NO = #{GenHisNo} , TYPE = #{Type} , PATH = #{Path} , DEL_FLG = #{DelFlg} , CREATE_USER = #{CreateUser} , CREATE_DATE = #{CreateDate} , CREATE_TIME = #{CreateTime} , LAST_USER = #{LastUser} , LAST_DATE = curdate() , LAST_TIME = curtime() WHERE ID = #{ID}
mapper.select: SELECT ID AS "ID" , GEN_HIS_NO AS "GenHisNo" , TYPE AS "Type" , PATH AS "Path" , DEL_FLG AS "DelFlg" , CREATE_USER AS "CreateUser" , CREATE_DATE AS "CreateDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "CreateTime" , LAST_USER AS "LastUser" , LAST_DATE AS "LastDate" , LAST_TIME AS "LastTime" FROM T05_GEN_HISTORY_STREAM WHERE ID = #{ID}

SELECT ID AS "ID" , GEN_HIS_NO AS "GenHisNo" , TYPE AS "Type" , PATH AS "Path" , DEL_FLG AS "DelFlg" , CREATE_USER AS "CreateUser" , CREATE_DATE AS "CreateDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "CreateTime" , LAST_USER AS "LastUser" , LAST_DATE AS "LastDate" , LAST_TIME AS "LastTime" FROM T05_GEN_HISTORY_STREAM WHERE ID = #{ID} FOR UPDATE

SELECT ID AS "ID" , GEN_HIS_NO AS "GenHisNo" , TYPE AS "Type" , PATH AS "Path" , DEL_FLG AS "DelFlg" , CREATE_USER AS "CreateUser" , CREATE_DATE AS "CreateDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "CreateTime" , LAST_USER AS "LastUser" , LAST_DATE AS "LastDate" , LAST_TIME AS "LastTime" FROM T05_GEN_HISTORY_STREAM WHERE ${_dynamicWhereCondition} ORDER BY ID ORDER BY ${_orderByCondition} FETCH FIRST ${_fetchFirstCondition} ROWS ONLY LIMIT ${_limitCondition} OFFSET ${_offsetCondition}
